name: Mipsy
description:
Mipsy is a platformer prototype made for the Godot Wild Jam #5 using Godot 3.1 master branch.  

I focused my game play on the theme "One Control".  And "One Control" for this game is a jump.  But there are variations on the jump, and the game was still able to be written as a traditional platformer even with this limitation.

In this small jam project your goal is to escape the factory in 2.5 minutes.  There are six stages, with each stage increasing in difficulty. 

While the game can be played with a keyboard I find a controller more responsive.
